products.name: Executive Leather Notebook
products.description: A luxurious leather-bound notebook with 200 pages of high-quality, acid-free paper. Perfect for business meetings and personal journaling.

products.name: Classic Hardcover Journal
products.description: A premium hardcover journal with a classic design, featuring 150 lined pages for thoughtful writing and reflections.

products.name: Pocket Notebook Trio
products.description: A set of three portable pocket notebooks, each with 64 pages of smooth, fountain pen-friendly paper. Ideal for on-the-go note-taking.

products.name: 2024 Luxe Planner
products.description: An elegant planner with a leather cover, monthly and weekly views, and goal-setting sections. Designed to help you plan your year with style and efficiency.

products.name: Gold Foil Memo Cards
products.description: A set of 50 memo cards with gold foil accents, perfect for quick notes, reminders, or leaving thoughtful messages.

products.name: Marble Finish Desk Pad
products.description: A stylish desk pad with a marble finish, featuring a smooth writing surface and built-in calendar. Adds a touch of elegance to any workspace.

products.name: Leather-bound Sketchbook
products.description: A premium sketchbook with a soft leather cover and 120 pages of heavyweight, acid-free paper. Perfect for artists and designers.

products.name: Elegant Note Card Set
products.description: A set of 20 premium note cards with matching envelopes, embossed with a subtle design. Ideal for personal correspondence or thank you notes.

products.name: Minimalist Weekly Planner Pad
products.description: A sleek and simple weekly planner pad with tear-off sheets, designed to keep your week organized and your desk clutter-free.

products.name: Luxury Pen and Notebook Set
products.description: A sophisticated gift set featuring a high-quality rollerball pen and a matching leather-bound notebook. Perfect for professionals and stationery enthusiasts.
